Name: Sci-Fantasy Defence
About the game: Sci-Fantasy Defence is a combination of real time strategy and first-person shooter. Survive and protect a portal to escape from a dangerous place. Use advanced technologies to extract resources, construct buildings and craft weapons. Slow down time for base building and other activities. Build a deck to buff your weapons and gain magical abilities. Build a Base Choose a place to build a base with the most profitable resources for you. Manage resources for more effective defense against enemies. Build a wall and turrets. Calculate expendables usage so that they are enough for the operation of the turrets. Build a Deck Get rewards for leveling up in the form of cards. With these cards, you can get buffs for your weapons / turrets or spells. Defend Defend yourself from thousands of enemies. Manipulate Time Slow down time to perform strategic actions such as constructing buildings and assessing the overall situation. Combine with special cards.
